text:
Yep, that's definitely something I love about this industry is that there will always be something new to learn! And yep, it's currently sitting on my shelf along with some other compositing and film books. I've spent quite a bit of time with Steve Wright, lol! I'll have to revisit this book though, thanks for the pointer.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'll have to go deep-diving in Pexels, lots of good HD footage there. I'm realizing more that I need to refocus on retargeting for the kind of work three is around here as a junior comp artist. And thanks, no rush! Not many people have taken the time to dissect my reel at all, so any feedback is very appreciated.
